column3: Wouldn't it make more sense to do this conditional on that particular use case?
Actually, when would this matter at all? If the wallet is on a stale chain, the process of reorganising should do the rescan for the user anyway?

> Actually, when would this matter at all?\n\nWhen you pass in the height or time of a block in the active chain that the wallet hasn't yet caught up with. For example, the active chain is at height=100, the wallet at height=90. A user specifies a range to rescan=[95,100], which wouldn't succeed.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
